author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two men surrendered at the District Sessions Court here on Friday in connection with the murder of a panchayat union chairman in Kancheepuram.

Hacked to death

The chairman of Abdullapuram Panchayat union of Cheyyar taluk in Tiruvannamalai district, Abdul Rehman, was hacked to death by three assailants when he was visiting his lands near Kancheepuram on Wednesday.

The deceased was also the Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam’s local union secretary.

On Friday, two of the three accused in the murder case - Sundar (30) of Tiruvannamalai, and Moses (28) of Annekal in Karnataka - surrendered before Judge Rajkumar at the District Sessions Court in Krishnagiri.
title: Two murder accused surrender at Krishnagiri court
